items.name: Figo
items.description: Figo combines modern styling, with an impressive interior and attractive pricing.

items.name: Fiesta
items.description: The Fiesta features a new, more sculpted look. From its grille to its sleek new hood.

items.name: Focus
items.description: It only takes a glance to see 2014 Ford Focus dynamic new look.

items.name: Fusion
items.description: With its sculpted lines and sleek silhouette, the 2015 Ford Fusion conveys a sense of agility.

items.name: Ecosport
items.description: The new 2015 Ford EcoSport is designed from the ground up with driving fun in mind.

items.name: Taurus
items.description: The Taurus design could be characterized as aggressive, bold, almost menacing.

items.name: Mustang
items.description: The classic Mustang Fastback has returned with an entirely new energy.

items.name: Roush
items.description: ROUSH  Supercharged 5.0 V8 Engine boosts power to 525bhp and offers 465lb ft of torque.

items.name: Escape
items.description: Adding to its sleek appearance is several design cues including sculpted wheel arches.

items.name: Edge
items.description: From the bold front grille through the fluid shapes and smooth lines that run the length of its body.

items.name: Explorer
items.description: A strong structure serves as the foundation for Explorer capability.

items.name: Flex
items.description: Beginning with the unmistakable chrome grille that continues its linear design.

items.name: Expedition
items.description: Capability in size, power, comfort and versatility is but one way the 2015 Ford Expedition.

items.name: Ranger
items.description: Ranger gives you what you want from a full-size pickup in a compact truck that's priced much less.

items.name: E-series
items.description: The Ford E-Series is built for heavier duty requirements.

items.name: F-150
items.description: An entirely unique truck, F-150 is very tough to take on a rough side of you and the road.

items.name: F-250
items.description: The F-250 is the first among the line up of Super Duty F-Series trucks. It is available in 3 cab styles.

items.name: F-350
items.description: Only one heavy-duty pickup runs roughshod over the competition: F-Series Super Duty.

items.name: F-450
items.description: The F-450 Super Duty is available in three cab styles- Regular, Super Cab and Crew Cab.

items.name: F-550
items.description: It's not just a new powertrain. It's a new powertrain that's Built Ford Tough.
